topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540dfaff6368727f04b90100#post_540dfaff6368727f04b90100
Wrong thing.

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540dfaa16368722b77e40100#post_540dfaa16368722b77e40100
"Gamergate":http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/events/gamergate
Tl:dr; video game journalists were caught red handed being corrupt and are trying to destroy ALL gaming saying "gamers are no longer the target demographic for video games"/"gamers are worse than ISIS"/"kill all gamers"/"all gamers are misogynistic neckbeard men" which pissed off 500,000,000 people and now they're wondering why the people that oppose them are millions strong whereas their side literally has only 20k. . . None of that was a exaggeration or fabrication in the slightest.
IGF, a massively important organization in gaming, was caught racketeering.
Rumors are Phil Fish, creator of Fez, has ran from the country after IGF was found out to be racketeering.
Anti-gamergate crowd are so desperate at this point to be validated that they're creating a universal blocking bot for their side to block everyone with a dissenting opinion.
Reddit was caught red handed saying that they will accuse admins of distributing child porn if they support the anti-SJW side.
Neogf caught red handed censoring and banning anyone with a dissenting opinion.
Kotaku banning anyone that disagrees with them.
Escapist forced to change their code of conduct.
Gamasutra journalist had a massive breakdown that was taken down and was hilariously sad.
Kotaku added a clause disallowing racketeering to their code of conduct.
SJW caught red handed stealing people's bank information, social security numbers and fabricating evidence.
Anita Sarkeesian distributed child porn to her 100k followers by redistributing a tweet aimed at her instead of reporting it to the fbi; gamergate side were the ones who reported it to the fbi and got it taken down.
SJW attack and take down a pro-womens charity.

Tl:dr; video game journalism massively corrupt.  SJW, third wave feminists and anti-gamergate side are massively desperate for a win cause they picked a group of people to bully that they can't win against so they're resorting to doxing, stealing people's personal information, blanket internet censorship, cyberterrorism(no not a joke either) to win cause "lost the fight" is not something they can physically understand.

"If you want a longer explanation that explains the full story":http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/826/711/3b4.png
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540dfdc16368726b99ca0000#post_540dfdc16368726b99ca0000

Depends. 

Manga... It hasn't aged well. The anime... Slightly better.

I'm a borderline fanboy of this series. One Piece is superior in +many+ ways.

Maybe the word I'm looking for is that, it has potential due to the many mythologies it manages to reconcile, but if you're used to more modern way of storytelling it might not be that good.

Unless you're into cheesy, old school 80's shonen, this might not be what you want. And if you have consistency issues, yeah, this is gonna make you scratch your head so hard you'll reach you're brain.

I can try to defend some points, but only to certain extent.

Give it a watch if you want, but every english sub and scan is horrendously done, full of typos and misstranslations. If I can find a good one in English, I promise I'll send the link.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540dff6c63687257480e0100#post_540dff6c63687257480e0100
Here's a image that summarizes what is going on:
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/815/109/658.jpg!

A more apt summary is SJW have lost their shit and are resorting to cyberterrorism, but the internet's had enough of their shit so rather than letting their movement live another day it's now a cagefight with only one group walking out; on one side are gamers and on the other side SJW, no compromises, not a timed match, no throwing in the towel, no tapping out, only one is walking out of the cage.
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540e01b86368726b995d0100#post_540e01b86368726b995d0100
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540e00d96368727161470100#post_540e00d96368727161470100

I never really noticed anything like that there. Though I've only gone a few times.

The gaming community isn't something I really know anything about, I just play games for fun. And after hearing about this gamergate thing, I really don't WANT to know anything about it. Iz scary.[/bq]
Everyone on the gamergate side just wants to play our video games; we're just sick of SJW telling us what we're "allowed" to like and play and everyone's had enough of their shit.  The gamergate side includes gamers, non-gamers, 4chan, tumblr, reddit, youtube, knowyourmeme, bronies, furries, weaboos, straights, gays, bisexuals, transgender, caucasians, african americans, asians, hispanics, conservatives, liberals, republicans, democrats, soldiers, pacifistic, christians, muslims, atheists, buddhists, agnostics and that's the short version.  That's how many people the SJW have pissed off.
For freedom! For glory! For video games!
